ing.item: Cheddar cheese; cut into 1/2 inch pi

directions.step:
1. Preheat the broiler. Pat the frankfurters dry. In a skillet cook the bacon for 3 minutes or until still pliable and not crisp.
2. Transfer to paper towels to drain.
3. Cut a 1/2-inch slit lengthwise from end to end of each frankfurter. Stuff each frankfurter with the cheese.
4. Wrap the entire length of each frankfurter with 2 slices of the bacon and secure with toothpicks.
5. Place the prepared frankfurters on a rack over a baking pan or on a broiler pan. Broil the frankfurters until the bacon is crispy, about 2 to 3 minutes. Serve frankfurters in rolls.
